TextBlock.Text: YARROW: I have exciting news, Privet: The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is almost prepared to receive the probe data from the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>.
YARROW: Ramie is adding some finishing touches here, but she’ll be finished soon. Are you and the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> well?
PRIVET: We are! The statue here in the<color=orange> Probe Tracking Module </color>is ready to record each launch’s flight trajectory and will automatically transmit all relevant data to you.
PRIVET: Once the probe determines the location of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>, I’ll send an alert directly to you and Ramie.
PRIVET: On the other appendage, I’m now worried about this <color=orange>cannon</color>’s structural integrity and its crew’s moral integrity.
